Deprecated Interfaces
org.drools.runtime.ExitPoint
          Use Channel instead 
 

Deprecated Enums
org.drools.conf.MultithreadEvaluationOption
            
 

Deprecated Methods
org.drools.builder.help.DroolsJaxbHelperProvider.addXsdModel(Resource, KnowledgeBuilder, Options, String)
          This is now deprecated, as we now support XSD as a standard ResourceType. Although you'll still need the newJAXBContext method to create a JAXBContext from the KnowledgeBase.

org.drools.command.CommandFactoryService.newKBuilderSetPropertyCommand(String, String, String)
           
org.drools.command.CommandFactory.newKBuilderSetPropertyCommand(String, String, String)
           
org.drools.runtime.KnowledgeRuntime.registerExitPoint(String, ExitPoint)
          Use KnowledgeRuntime.registerChannel(String, Channel) instead. 
org.drools.runtime.KnowledgeRuntime.unregisterExitPoint(String)
          Use KnowledgeRuntime.unregisterChannel(String) instead.
